data.description:
t is the year 2322, humanity is using light speed to travel across through Universe spaceships are travelling in different and distant planets to search new civilizations. 
The spaceship "HermesX" is a state of the art spaceship with the mission to locate new alien life. Hermes X has very few weapon systems and its crew is composed mostly scientists and civilians. You are the only military expert in charge for security and the safety of the crew. 
During a trip to the distant Sector X234. A red beacon appears on the radar map showing an alien spaceship approaching. All communication with the spaceship fails and suddenly a strange pulse from the large spaceship disables all HermesX functions.
A strange green gas emits inside the spaceship making everyone lose consciousness. You manage to hold a while longer but lose slowly consciousness as well. Last images you remember are the main doors opening and heavy footsteps moving inside the shipâ€¦..

HermesX is a dark Sci Fi FPS game with many adventure and horror elements. Explore the decks of your vast spaceship filled with corrupted crew members and alien creatures and discover the dark truth behind the alien invasion. 

- Explore many different levels in an dark and immersive VR experience.
- Fight friends and enemies with a large number of melee and ranged weaponry.
- Use stealth and cunning to escape ambushes and traps.
- Make choices that can be the difference between life and death.
